thread.title: Mike B.
thread.title_full: RVT.com Classifieds reviewed by Mike B.

author: Mike B.
title: Mike B.
text: I sold our motorhome and towed vehicle in nine days. I had a little trouble creating a "linked" ad for these, but the customer service rep I spoke with fixed that quickly. I liked that when I Googled the year make and model of our vehicles, a link to our ads came up near the top of the search results. Would definitely use RVT.com again.
